title: An Unprecedented Opportunity to Build Dynamic, Secure Broadband Access for All of the U.S.
description: All Americans, regardless of background or location, deserve a fast, safe, and reliable digital experience. Whether in Silicon Valley, rural Montana, or an underserved area in Chicago, entrepreneurs, businesses, and consumers should be on an equal footing online. Unfortunately, that is not the current reality, and the pandemic only amplified and exacerbated the existing digital divides we know so well.
author: Robert Blumofe & Lauren Van Wazer
